item.title: Playwright, Possible Puppeteer Successor
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: From the people who brought you Puppeteer comes Playwright. The immediate difference is that Playwright supports Chromium, WebKit and Firefox on Linux, MacOS, and Windows. As things stand today, that covers the most used browsers across the most used server and desktop platforms. Even if Playwright offers no other benefits, this alone would be enough […]
item.content:encoded:
From the people who brought you Puppeteer comes Playwright. The immediate difference is that Playwright supports Chromium, WebKit and Firefox on Linux, MacOS, and Windows.

As things stand today, that covers the most used browsers across the most used server and desktop platforms. Even if Playwright offers no other benefits, this alone would be enough to make it worthy contender.
